mapper.select: select brd.partici_memb_uni_no, brd.brd_uni_no, brd.board_nm, brd.pubc_yn, brd.reg_dt, brd.prj_uni_no, brd_bm.brd_yn FROM brd LEFT OUTER JOIN brd_bm ON brd.brd_uni_no = brd_bm.brd_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN brd_cm ON brd.brd_uni_no = brd_cm.board_uni_no WHERE brd.prj_uni_no=#{prjUniNo} and (brd.pubc_yn = 'Y' OR (brd.pubc_yn='N' and brd_cm.partici_memb_uni_no=#{particiMembUniNo})) ORDER BY brd.reg_dt
SELECT * FROM chatr_partici WHERE chatr_no = #{chatrNo} AND arm_yn='Y'
SELECT * FROM prj_partici_memb WHERE prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo} AND partici_memb_uni_no NOT IN (SELECT partici_memb_uni_no FROM brd_cm WHERE board_uni_no = #{brdUniNo})

SELECT p.post_uni_no, p.brd_uni_no, p.ttl, p.cm, p.partici_memb_uni_no, p.post_tag_arm, p.reply_arm_yn, p.noti_yn, p.noti_reg_dt, p.write_dt, m.nnm FROM post p JOIN prj_partici_memb m ON p.partici_memb_uni_no = m.partici_memb_uni_no WHERE p.brd_uni_no=#{brdUniNo} ORDER BY write_dt desc

SELECT a.board_partici_memb_uni_no, a.partici_memb_uni_no, a.board_uni_no, p.nnm FROM brd_cm a LEFT OUTER JOIN prj_partici_memb p ON a.partici_memb_uni_no = p.partici_memb_uni_no WHERE a.board_uni_no = #{brdUniNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE prj_partici_memb SET arm_yn = #{armYn} WHERE partici_memb_uni_no = #{particiMembUniNo}
